title: Fillet of sea bass with ragoût of spring onion and sauce vierge
description: Parsley sauce vierge makes a wonderful accompaniment to sea bass in this easy recipe - perfect for entertaining.
ingredients: 200g/7oz pancetta, cut into thin strips about 0.5cm/¼in thickness, then julienned
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 x 150g/5oz sea bass fillets, pin boned
1 bunch spring onions, peeled, finely sliced
